api.jaws

Class Jaws

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.jaws.Jaws

  • public class Jaws
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the main functionality required to communicate with the Jaws remote API.
    Author:
    Martin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Jaws(java.lang.String privateKey, java.lang.String publicKey)
      Links objects of this class to the Jaws remote API.
      Jaws(java.lang.String privateKey, java.lang.String publicKey, boolean useSSL)
      Links objects of this class to the Jaws remote API.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAcknowledgement()
      Returns the acknowledgement string that must be displayed by all applications that use the Jaws API.
      Location getLastLocation(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the last known location of a shark.
      java.lang.String getLastUpdated()
      Returns the last time the content in the Jaws API dataset was updated.
      Shark getShark(java.lang.String name)
      Returns an object containing all pertinent details about a shark.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSharkNames()
      Returns the list of shark names currently in the dataset.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTagLocations()
      Returns a list of the locations in which the sharks in the dataset were tagged.
      java.lang.String getVideo(java.lang.String name)
      Returns a link to a video of a given shark, if one exists.
      java.util.ArrayList<Ping> past24Hours()
      Returns the name and contact time for those sharks that have been detected in the past 24 hours.
      java.util.ArrayList<Ping> pastMonth()
      Returns the name and contact time for those sharks that have been detected in the past month.
      java.util.ArrayList<Ping> pastWeek()
      Returns the name and contact time for those sharks that have been detected in the past week.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Jaws

        public Jaws(java.lang.String privateKey,
            java.lang.String publicKey,
            boolean useSSL)
        Links objects of this class to the Jaws remote API. Requires a pre-validated private and public key. Connections sent over SSL are recommended, but if performance degrades, this parameter should be set to false.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - Pre-validated private key
        publicKey - Pre-validated public key
        useSSL - Whether to issue commands using a secure connection

      • Jaws

        public Jaws(java.lang.String privateKey,
            java.lang.String publicKey)
        Links objects of this class to the Jaws remote API. Requires a pre-validated private and public key. Connections are sent over SSL by default.
        Parameters:
        privateKey -
        publicKey -

    • Method Detail

      • getSharkNames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSharkNames()
        Returns the list of shark names currently in the dataset.
        Returns:
        A list of shark names

      • getShark

        public Shark getShark(java.lang.String name)
        Returns an object containing all pertinent details about a shark.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the shark for which you wish to gather data
        Returns:
        An object containing pertinent details about a shark

      • past24Hours

        public java.util.ArrayList<Ping> past24Hours()
        Returns the name and contact time for those sharks that have been detected in the past 24 hours.
        Returns:
        A list of names and timestamps

      • pastWeek

        public java.util.ArrayList<Ping> pastWeek()
        Returns the name and contact time for those sharks that have been detected in the past week.
        Returns:
        A list of names and timestamps

      • pastMonth

        public java.util.ArrayList<Ping> pastMonth()
        Returns the name and contact time for those sharks that have been detected in the past month. Be warned, this method can return a large amount of data.
        Returns:
        A list of names and timestamps

      • getLastLocation

        public Location getLastLocation(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the last known location of a shark.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the shark to locate
        Returns:
        The location of the shark

      • getVideo

        public java.lang.String getVideo(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a link to a video of a given shark, if one exists.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the shark to find a video URL for
        Returns:
        Video URL

      • getTagLocations

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTagLocations()
        Returns a list of the locations in which the sharks in the dataset were tagged.
        Returns:
        List of tag locations

      • getLastUpdated

        public java.lang.String getLastUpdated()
        Returns the last time the content in the Jaws API dataset was updated.
        Returns:
        Update time
